description: The only daughter of the Sugita family, a family that has rivalled the Nakabayashi family for generations. As Yoshitaka hit bankruptcy, Takami seized the opportunity to claim the Nakabayashi estate. Her disposition is nothing short of arrogant and haughty. She also has an interest in Mitsuki`s production ability, since Takami was runner-up in the Net Idol competition.
name: Sugita Takami
